english.segment1: . Don't let your mind deny. What your heart believes. Leave your inhibitions. Let your soul be free
english.segment2: This is why you were created
english.segment3: It's your destiny. It's alright. It's alright. It's alright
english.segment4: Who the Son sets free. Yeah, they are free indeed. So let go with me. C'mon and sing what you believe
english.segment5: We're gonna shout His praise at the top of our lungs. We're gonna dance for the glory of the risen Son. We're not ashamed, not ashamed of the One we love. We're gonna shout His praise at the top of our lungs
english.segment6: This is the praise of a people. That have been redeemed. This is the joy of the Lord. And the sound of the free
english.segment7: This is why we were created. It's our destiny. It's alright. It's alright. It's alright
